description: One of Belgium's last Holocaust survivors, Henri Kichka, succumbs to Covid-19.
title: Coronavirus: Auschwitz survivor Henri Kichka dies of Covid-19
title_page: Coronavirus: Auschwitz survivor Henri Kichka dies of Covid-19 - BBC News
maintext: Henri and his father were to work as slave labourers, while the women of the family - Henri's mother and his sisters as well as his aunt - were taken to Auschwitz where they were gassed and cremated as soon as they arrived.
